# include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <string.h>
# include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long unsigned int a=1,b=1,x,y,z,temp,cnt;
	while(1)
	{
		x=1;
		y=2;
		z=3;
		cnt=0;
		scanf("%llu %llu",&a,&b);
		if(!(a||b))
			break;
		if((x>=a)&&(x<=b))
			cnt++;
		if((y>=a)&&(y<=b))
			cnt++;
		while(1)
		{
			if(z>b)
				break;
			else
			{
				if(z>=a)
					cnt++;
				temp=y+z;
				x=y;
				y=z;
				z=temp;
			}
		}
		printf("%llu\n",cnt);
	}
	return 0;
}
